data.actual_result: It moves as if you turned off, open a warning, and the option moved back as if you turned it on again
data.expected_result: It should be as if you turned off as you did try to turn it off
data.short_description: Clicking on "Use data to..." opens a warning and moves it back alone
data.steps_to_repro: - Open Privacy&Safety - make sure one of the "Use data to..." is in the background - Tick it and watch how a warning  will open and the animation will move it back without clicking "No, take me back!"
